title: Floral Print Dress
short_description: A stunning floral print dress perfect for any occasion.
long_description: This beautiful dress features a vibrant floral print, a flattering fit-and-flare silhouette, and a comfortable stretch fabric. It's ideal for weddings, parties, or any special event.

title: Maxi Dress
short_description: Elegant maxi dress for a glamorous look.
long_description: This elegant maxi dress is perfect for formal occasions or evening events. With its flowing silhouette and delicate details, it's sure to turn heads wherever you go.

title: Little Black Dress
short_description: Classic little black dress for timeless style.
long_description: Every woman needs a little black dress in her wardrobe, and this one is a must-have. With its simple yet chic design, it's perfect for cocktails, dinner dates, or nights out on the town.

title: Lace Cocktail Dress
short_description: Gorgeous lace cocktail dress for a romantic look.
long_description: This stunning lace cocktail dress is perfect for date nights or special occasions. With its intricate lace detailing and figure-flattering silhouette, you'll feel elegant and feminine all night long.

title: Wrap Dress
short_description: Versatile wrap dress for effortless style.
long_description: This versatile wrap dress is a wardrobe staple that can be dressed up or down for any occasion. With its flattering wrap silhouette and soft jersey fabric, it's comfortable and chic for all-day wear.
